name: Zinc-Nickel Alloy Front Upper & Lower Ball Joints for 1999-2008 Chevrolet Silverado 1500 GMC Tahoe Sierra Suburban Yukon Avalanche XL Cadillac Classic Escalade Express 2500 ESV EXT Savana K6540 K6541
short_description: ✔OE# ‎K6540&K6541. Compatible with: For 02-06 Cadillac Escalade/Escalade EXT丨03-06 Escalade ESV. For 02-06 Chevrolet Avalanche 1500丨03-08 Express 1500丨03-05 Express 2500丨99-03 Silverado 1500 4WD/AWD丨04-06 Silverado 1500 4WD/RWD丨00-06 Suburban 1500丨01-06 Tahoe. For GMC 03-08 Savana 1500丨03-05 Savana 2500丨99-06 Sierra 1500 4WD/AWD丨04-06 Sierra 1500 RWD丨01-06 Yukon丨00-06 Yukon XL 1500. Please see below for more vehicles.

✔Excellent Function: The ball joint consists of a ball and socket that attaches to a connecting rod and allows it to move. They do this by creating a pivot between the steering knuckle and the control arm. The use of ball connections to achieve different coaxial power transmission, provide multi-angle rotation, so that the steering mechanism can be smooth steering, reduce vibration and achieve smooth steering.

✔High-quality: Long lasting surface treatment that matches OE standard is applied in Zn-Ni alloy coating method method to prevent rust.Neoprene rubber have more resistance to oxidation, more abrasion resistance, more flame resistance. Also, our products has undergone extreme impact, wear, and fatigue testing to help ensure quality and durability.
✔Package included: Front Upper Ball Joints x2, Front Lower Ball Joints x2, Grease Fittings x4, Cotter Pins x4, Nuts x4, Snap Rings x4. Not included instruction manual. Easy to install.
✔After-Sales Service: We offer 24 hours customer service and 1 year product service,, If you are encounter product installation, product quality and other problems, please feel free to contact us.
